substitution.copyText: Ham. Haste me to know't that I with wings as swift
substitution.amendedText: Ham. Haste me to know it, that I, with wings as swift

substitution.copyText: " The duller should'st thou be than the fat weed | " That roots it self in ease on Lethe's wharf, | " Would'st thou not sir in this: ,, now Hamlet hear,
Ham. O my Prophetick soul, my Uncle?
substitution.amendedText: Ham. O, my Prophetick soul! my Uncle?

substitution.copyText: " With witchcraft of his wits, with his trait'rous gifts, | " O wicked wits, and gifts that have the power | " So to seduce! ,, won to his shameful lust
To those of mine " but vertue, as it never will be mov'd
